subject: Passing argument to main() through JUnit TestCase
msgSnippet: Hi, I would like to know if is there way to pass an argument to my program main() method which takes a single argument to run through Junit TestCase. Thanks
messageBody:
Hi,

I would like to know if is there way to pass an argument to my
program main() method which takes a single argument to run through
Junit TestCase.

Thanks and appreciated!
